emails.content: Hi Team, Hope you are well! According to clause 8.8.2 of our Master Service Agreement, the initial term of each Order Form begins on the specified date and continues for the subscription term outlined. After this, the Order Form automatically renews for additional 12-month periods unless we receive a written notice of termination at least 30 days prior to the renewal date. As we did not receive such notice, your licenses have already been activated and are accessible from day one, and we cannot roll them back or modify. Request you to please process the payment for this auto renewal invoice. We trust that these licenses will continue to support your needs effectively. We would like to point out that these automatically renewed licenses might be offered to you at a discounted rate compared to ongoing prices, providing you with significant savings. Just a heads up for the future renewals, if you wish to terminate it, please ensure to send us a termination notice at least 30 days before the current subscription ends. This will allow us to adjust our system to prevent future renewals. . Thank you for your understanding and continued partnership. Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions or need further assistance. Regards. Anis Qures

Request you to please process the payment for this auto renewal invoice. We trust that these licenses will continue to support your needs effectively.
 
We would like to point out that these automatically renewed licenses might be offered to you at a discounted rate compared to ongoing prices, providing you with significant savings.
 
Just a heads up for the future renewals, if you wish to terminate it, please ensure to send us a termination notice at least 30 days before the current subscription ends. This will allow us to adjust our system to prevent future renewals.
.
Thank you for your understanding and continued partnership. Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions or need further assistance.
Regards. 
Anis Qures

Hi Casey,

Thank you for contacting us.

I am writing to inform you that your subscription is enrolled in the auto-renewal program. As a result, this license has been renewed successfully. Regrettably, we are unable to modify for these contracts.

To avoid any interruption in services, we sent reminder emails 30 days prior to the renewal date, providing assistance, information, or the option to cancel if needed. If we did not receive any responses at least 30 days before the current contract's expiration, we proceeded with the renewal as planned and issued the renewal invoice.

We require a minimum of 30 days' notice before the expiration of your active licenses. To facilitate the smooth management of your subscription. 

However, we can change it for the future invoices, please confirm and let me know if you have any questions.

Warm regards,

Hi Parker Thank you for your email. I am writing to inform you that, this license was renewed due to our Auto-Renewal feature going live. INV170605 is an auto renewal of last year's invoice INV142206. We have started this process to try and streamline the Renewal process. We are Auto Renewing our clients if they don't inform us at least 30 days or 60 days prior to their current contract expiring, so they don't face any interruptions in service or any delays. Litera would have required a cancellation notice 30 days or 60 days prior to previous subscription getting expired. This clause is written in Litera Master terms, please refer clause 8.2 of our MSA attached herewith. Litera Master Terms. We will not be able to cancel this invoice at least for this year if Litera has not received any cancellation notice. Request you to please provide any cancellation notice you might have given on this, and I would make sure swiftly to bring this to the attention of our internal team. If you want to cancel for next year, please let me know. Thanks !! Hi Tracey,

Thank you for contacting us.

We don't have PO associated with this invoice as your contract falls under auto invoicing. The system generates the invoice 60 days prior to the renewal, and they send it to the customer to remind of the renewal and the PO number if required on the invoice to be generated. So can you please check internally and provide the same and I can update it on the invoice.

Please let me know if you have any questions.

Warm regards,

I am writing to inform you that your subscription is enrolled in the auto-renewal program. As a result, this license has been renewed successfully. Regrettably, we are unable to manually do any modifications to this contract. 

To avoid any interruption in services, we sent reminder emails 30 days prior to the renewal date, providing assistance, information, or the option to cancel if needed. If we did not receive any responses at least 30 days before the current contract's expiration, we proceeded with the renewal as planned and issued the renewal invoice.

We require a minimum of 30 days' notice before the expiration of your active licenses. To facilitate the smooth management of your subscription, please plan accordingly for your renewal next year.

Warm regards,

If you received this email in error, please delete it and notify us immediately, and do not use, rely on, distribute, or disclose it.Emails and other communication systems are intrinsically insecure and may contain damaging content. We do not accept responsibility for harm caused by damaging or inauthentic email. Insight investment records and monitors emails, messages, calls, and their contents on a partly selective basis for regulatory compliance, training, and other purposes. Other parties to conversations may also record and process them. Insight Investment processes personal data including communications recordings in compliance with applicable privacy law in the UK, the EEA, the US and other territories. Insight processes personal data to deliver appropriate customer service, to understand our clients and comply with financial service regulations, to inform about our services, to conduct employment relationships, to fulfil our interests with suppliers of goods and services, and to archive communication and activity for regulatory and business requirements. We may transfer data between or within jurisdictions to our partners and suppliers to accomplish our purposes. More information on our processing, transfers, and your rights as a data subject, is available in the Insight Privacy Notice. All privacy enquiries should be passed to [EMAIL_37_75B238]. Insight does not sell or trade personal data. Insight Investment is the corporate brand for certain companies operated by Insight Investment Management Limited (IIML). Insight includes, among others, Insight Investment Management (Global) Limited (IIMG), Insight Investment International Limited (IIIL ), Insight Investment Management (Europe) Limited (IIMEL) and Insight North America LLC (INA), each of which provides asset management services. These companies may be referred to as ‘Insight' or ‘Insight Investment'. In the United Kingdom the business of Insight is conducted by IIMG, IIIL, which are registered in England (Nos. [ACCOUNT_NUMBER_4_13C930] and [ACCOUNT_NUMBER_5_BF7E6C] respectively). These companies' registered office is [ADDRESS_17_55B19A], London, EC4V 4LA. These companies are authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority. In certain European countries, the business of Insight is conducted by IIMEL, registered in Ireland, registration number 581405. The registered office is The Shipping Office, 20-26 Sir John Rogerson's Quay, Dublin 2, D02 Y049. IIMEL is regulated by the Central Bank of Ireland. CBI reference number C154503. In North America the services of Insight are offered by Insight North America LLC under the brand name Insight Investment. In Australia the business of Insight is conducted by Insight Investment Australia Pty Ltd, which is regulated by the Australian Securities and Investments Commission (Licence No. 230541), and registered in Australia ([TAX_ID_3_5E6EF4]). Services in Australia are also carried out by IIMG, which is exempt from the requirement to hold an Australian Financial Services licence in respect of the financial services it provides to wholesale investors in Australia and is authorised and regulated by the (UK) Financial Conduct Authority under UK laws, which differ from Australian laws. In Canada the services of Insight are offered by IIIL and IIMG. I n Japan the services of Insight are offered by IIIL.
